overview: Ben, Marino and Tim Ferris are at the golf driving range when Michelle Wright and Lucy Kent appear, are chatted up and taken back to Tim's house. Sue, initially bespectacled, brunette is picked up on a shopping trip and persuaded back to Ben's hotel room. Josie Wood is encountered by Ben and Marino while washing her car, they charm themselves into her house for a beer. Marina Curran is receptionist at studio.
title: Ben Dover's 9th
